title: 【英語】《武漢冠狀病毒疫情轉變成政治秀？》蕭茗采訪微生物學家，美軍研究員Dr. Lin Xiaoxu
contents:
“Wuhan Coronavirus Turned Into Political Show? Dr. Lin Xiaoxu”

Dr. Lin Xiaoxu
Microbiologist, Lab Director (Operational)
Walter Reed Army Institute of Research, Viral Diseases Branch

ResearchGate 上 Dr. Lin Xiaoxu 的著作頁：https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Xiaoxu_Lin
